CustomField.formula: Sender__c & " (" & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & "-" & TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) & " " & TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate), 12, 2))) & ":" & TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate), 15, 2))) & ")"
CustomField.label: Sender Label
